project_descr: Sub Regional Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) Localization Initiation Plan designed to provide on-going technical assistance to the Government of Samoa.

outputs.output_descr: Sub-Regional SDGs Localization designed to strengthen the weakness seen already in terms of planning and budgeting as well as monitoring and evaluation of the SDGs.
